statement.tex: \\ \text{Would this be the condition for }f(x)\\ \text{to be strictly decreasing?}

reason.tex: \text{It doesn't matter if }f(x)\gt 0\text{ or }f(x)\lt 0.\text{Only}\\ \text{that }a \gt b\implies f(a)\gt f(b)\implies\frac{d}{dx}f(x)\gt 0.
\text{Re-visit how to solve inequalities if you got this wrong.}
